pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Plots for All Variables in Descriptive Tables // Visualizes variables from descriptive tables produced by 'descsuppR::buildDescrTbl()' using 'ggstatsplot'. It automatically maps each variable to a suitable 'ggstatsplot' plotting function based on the applied or suggested statistical test. Users can override the automatic mapping via a named list of plot specifications. The package supports grouped and ungrouped tables, and forwards additional arguments to the underlying 'ggstatsplot' functions, providing quick, reproducible, and customizable default visualizations for descriptive summaries.
